title: Embroidered Picture, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal, linen 
Technique: satin, knot, couching and bullion stitches on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 13 x 13 cm (5 1/8 x 5 1/8 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Pascal Lamb in silk framed in metal thread.  Flowers in colored silk.
